properties.Name: Century House Senior Peer Counselling
properties.Descriptio: Trained senior volunteers provide free and confidential one-on-one support to older adults (50+) to help meet life's challenges.

properties.Name: New Westminster Mental Health Centre
properties.Descriptio: Offers outreach assessment, consultation and follow-up services for seniors experiencing psychiatric problems such as dementia.

properties.Name: New Westminster Parks, Culture and Recreation - Century House
properties.Descriptio: Serves as a community focal point for older adults (50+) and provides a variety of education, leisure, recreation and social programs.

properties.Name: New Westminster Police Department Elder Abuse Unit
properties.Descriptio: Offers victim assistance to seniors who may be experiencing elder abuse or neglect within a relationship. Offered in partnership with Family Services of Greater Vancouver.

properties.Name: Queen's Park Care Centre
properties.Descriptio: Provides residential care programs and services to seniors.

properties.Name: Queensborough 50+ Social Club
properties.Descriptio: Offers opportunities for friendship, fun and social interaction. Activities and programs include bingo, a social luncheon and volunteer opportunities.

properties.Name: Sapperton Old Age Pensioners Association
properties.Descriptio: Offers opportunities for friendship, fun and social interaction.

properties.Name: Seniors Services Society
properties.Descriptio: Offers a range of services to seniors, including a dining and lunch program, grocery shopping, housing services and meals-on-wheels.
